As it was to be expected, the foreign workers remained cool toward this
patriotic propaganda. Many workers, out of fear or other causes, declared themselves first class patriots.
As soon as one part of the foreign workers was considered patriotic, the rage went against those who remained calm and were not swayed by artificial sentiment.
